title: Oberriet railway station
text:
Oberriet railway station () is a railway station in <a href="Oberriet">Oberriet</a>, in the <a href="Switzerland">Swiss</a> <a href="Canton%20of%20Switzerland">canton</a> of <a href="Canton%20of%20St.%20Gallen">St. Gallen</a>. It is an intermediate stop on the <a href="Chur%E2%80%93Rorschach%20railway">Chur–Rorschach line</a>.
Services.
Oberriet is served by the S4 of the <a href="St.%20Gallen%20S-Bahn">St. Gallen S-Bahn</a>:
